website_summaries.verdict: Go with this option if you're looking for a one-a-day krill oil supplement that delivers real results.
pros: 1,000 mg of krill oil per capsule
Users report seeing improvements in their physical health after taking the supplement for a couple of weeks
cons: Capsules are large and can break open inside of the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Sports Research Krill Oil for over 2 years. It’s a great way to get some quality omega-3. It has helped minimize age related joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carlson

customer_reviews.title: But I am very happy with the outcome of her skin being on this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several other products from this company for myself and my husband and have actually been giving the Krill Oil to my dog who desperately needs her Omega 3s (as I only take vegetarian omega myself). But I am very happy with the outcome of her skin being on this supplement and I have tried other brands for her; I will be sticking with this one. This is my 3rd bottle of it for her. This is a high quality Krill oil and I know you have to be watchful of what brand you buy when it comes to Krill.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Vapor Supplements!
customer_reviews.text: I had to give 5 stars for easy to swallow because the bottle-though sealed-came with nothing but air inside it. I always wonder what we are actually getting when ordering (unregulated) supplements, but I have to really worry about a company whose manufacturing process results in sealed, empty bottles. At least this particular order did not violate the Hippocratic Oath. [My wife disagrees with the last statement as my blood pressure went through the roof.] Thank you to Amazon for quickly issuing a refund without requiring me to mail the empty bottle back. I will now look for another brand of Krill oil.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this krill , only one gell cap needed daily double the dose of other popular brands !! 1000 mg! I've taken krill oil for 4 years now and no repeating, digests without any fishey aftertaste !! Can't take fish oil in any form I've tried!! Sports Research is a great company to deal with and the quality of their product reflects that !! I have a high inflammation level and deal with that on a daily basis and this product really helps !!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: This is my go-to fish oil from now on
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this as a supplement once a day for the last 50 days for joints/arthritis inflammation and other health benefits that omega 3 can offer. I like the fact that I only take one capsule daily compared to other brands. My blood results showed lower cholesterol level by 20 points and my joints hardly bothered me even while I was walking 10,000 steps a day on cobblestone streets in my trip to Europe 2 weeks ago. Incredible!
customer_reviews.author: contessa2017

customer_reviews.title: Pill leakage, pills and container coated with red oil
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening bottle, immediately discovered pills and container were coated with heavy red oil. Upon emptying container contents, noticed that three pill capsules had ruptured spilling red Krill oil throughout the container, and coating the rest of its contence. For the price of this supplement I would have expected better product quality control, I will not be purchasing from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning Jack

customer_reviews.title: Little fishy aftertaste and now indigestion/bloat
customer_reviews.text: But good product overall. Recommend take with food to stop aftertaste. Update: Experiencing problem. This is creating a lot of acid reflux. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: False advertising - only 500mcg Anstaxanthin
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brand's krill oil specifically because of the advertised 1000mcg astaxanthin per softgel, which was stated multiple times in the product description as well as displayed in the supplement facts on the bottle in the product pictures. The bottle I received shows only 500mcg per softgel. Very disappointed, won't be buying from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Beck

customer_reviews.title: Broken Capsules
customer_reviews.text: Was excited for the price of this product but I guess you get what you pay for. 2 capsules were broken and the oil had accumulated at the bottom of the container, and gotten over all the other capsules rendering them useless. Guess I should have listened to the reviews calling the durability of the pills into question.
customer_reviews.author: randy j newbold

customer_reviews.title: Amazing result in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 2 months ago. I was struggling to bring my cholesterol level down so my doctor told me to take fish oil 1000mg. After reading the reviews i thought of giving a try. The result is amazing... in just 2 months my weight went from 148 lbs to 137 lbs. I workout 4 days a week and cut down on sugar. Soon i will be going for blood work.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Mess inside the bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time I've ordered from Sports Research. Matter of fact we were so impressed with the quality of the first bottle of Krill oil that I went and purchased Vit.K and D3. Unfortunately second bottle come with few broken capsuls inside making the content unusable
customer_reviews.author: Todor Jelev

customer_reviews.title: Best krill oil product I have tried so far!
customer_reviews.text: These no-after-taste black capsule are full of good old omega-3 and offer a wonderful heart health benefit. Reasonably priced, compared to other products, these are worth trying. Overall Rating from me: A++
customer_reviews.author: AZ McLennon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality oil, capsule QC needs work
customer_reviews.text: Although the capsules are a bit large, I have no problem swallowing them. I feel the quality of the oil is good and it never tastes fishy. However, after 3 good orders, my January subscription order turned out to have the leakage problem reported by many others. I tried to identify the culprit capsule, but it was an oily red mess and I ended up just tossing the entire $30 of capsules in the trash. Very disappointing! I will try again, but if I receive another bottle with leaky capsules I will have to change brands, as this seems to be a longtime complaint about this product, based on reviews.
customer_reviews.author: T.Barker

customer_reviews.title: Fishy after taste
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different types of omega 3 supplements, including a few other brands of krill oil specifically and I am not a fan of this one. The pills are large and although easy seemingly easy to swallow if you don’t drink a bunch of water with them they can get stuck in your throat and melt/dissolve there. Moreover, every single time I have taken these pills (30 + times) I have had a really bad fishy after taste no matter how much water I drink with them. For me, the fishy taste outweighs other benefits of this particular brand, I will be using another brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Garber

customer_reviews.title: The Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: We have been taking this krill oil supplement for several years now, and would not consider using any other brand. Not only does it not give you those awful 'fishy burps', but we love the fact that the krill is sustainably harvested. Sports Research makes excellent, reliable products!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P.

customer_reviews.title: This really work for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 41 year old women and I needed something that would lift my everyday mood since I been feeling down a lot so decided to go all out and give it a try and I’m really glad I did. After taking it for over a month, I can feel a big difference. I’m also taking it along with the K2+D3 (sports Research) and I’m also taking a B-complex with vitamin C (Solgar brand). I start my day with these after eating a healthy meal and feel really great all day everyday now and I definitely will be order more. I truly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: YBEATRIZ77

customer_reviews.title: These truly work.
customer_reviews.text: Immediately felt better. Swelling and pain in joints had reduced, at least, 50 percent!!! It's only been 3 weeks. How is this possible. My cholesterol is unmentionable... I am too embarrassed to post. I see my doctor in 2 months maybe I will post then.
customer_reviews.author: A-SHOPAHPLIC😄

customer_reviews.title: Improved cholesterol levels
customer_reviews.text: Antarctic krill oil increased my HDL level (good cholesterol) by 35 points and lowered my LDL level (bad cholesterol) by 20 points. My triglycerides stayed the same, but they have always been low because I don’t eat much sugar. I had labs drawn before starting it and after finishing the bottle at a physical and then at work wellness. It did give me algae type burps, but I think it’s the astaxanthin not the krill oil itself. I didn’t notice much difference with pain relief. However, my brain seems better...more clear headed and memory is better by the end of the bottle. I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 71sunshine

customer_reviews.title: LDL cholesterol (bad) went up, HDL cholesterol (good) went down
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a quality product, the pills were intact, easy to swallow and had no fishy aftertaste, but I did not get the results I wanted. My cholesterol levels had been steady at 215 for the last several visits to my doctor, and that's what it was in October 2019. Began taking Sports Research Antarctic Krill Oil December 2019 and set up auto subscription. Went in for bloodwork March 2020 after 4 months of taking this krill oil, my total cholesterol was 270 and LDL was down. Not the results I was hoping for, doctor told me to stop taking it. I stopped taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs RockTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Leaking capsules
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for a few years and I really like their product! However, my few orders have had several capsules that have leaked. Actually, it’s hard to tell how many capsules have actually leaked exactly, but all capsules (yes, every capsule) is wet with the oil that has leaked. I thought it was a fluke a few bottles back, so I continued placing more orders. I’m a little bummed, but I guess I’m going to look for another brand. The oil gets on your fingers and hands so you must wash them to get the orange oil off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: I have started taking this because fish oil is recommended for asthma
customer_reviews.text: I have started taking this because fish oil is recommended for asthma. I started having asthma about 5 years ago, right before I turned 30! So I've been trying to find a good supplement for myself that is effective. Since I've started taking this along with a few other recommended supplements I have had my night asthma attacks almost totally disappear. I don't know which supplement it is, but they all seem to be helping as I've taken different brands of the same things for all these years now without great results. I will continue to use this product as I believe it is helping!
customer_reviews.author: mecan

customer_reviews.title: No Aftertaste, Sustainably Sourced
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Sports Research Antarctic Krill Oil (Double Strength) with Omega-3s EPA, DHA and Astaxanthin (60 Softgels - 1000mg) for about 2 months. While it is difficult to feel a definitive impact from its use, there are a couple of definite things I like. First, I am personally convinced that Krill oil is better regular fish oil in supplying omega 3 fatty acids. Second, the Sports Research Krill oil had no aftertaste which makes it, at least for me more desirable.The fact that it is certifiably sustainably sourced is another positive. Finally, a fairly minor point is it comes packaged with a flip top cap, which for my aging hands is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: must buy for joint pain relief and overall wellness
customer_reviews.text: I have severe joint pain in my knees, this product has helped tremendously. I use this in conjunction with turmeric curcumin another fantastic product this company sells. you will notice the results very quickly and continually. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Cholesterol knock-out
customer_reviews.text: I started using this 3 months ago due to high cholesterol levels which I was not able to bring down on my own eating a sensible diet. Doctor put me on statins which I wasn’t to crazy about due to the bad reviews given on taken these drugs. My levels dropped from 317 to 150 and I am thrilled with the results. Not only dropped my levels but the joint aches have also disappeared. Did a lot of research before choosing this product and I feel this is the best
customer_reviews.author: jayne pate

customer_reviews.title: OMGEGA 3!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent nutrient we should all take! in the US besides all the toxins in the "food" there is a dis-balance on omega 3 and omega 6, there is way more omega 6 in "food" than omega 3, and this is double strength , I know that for some people may feel a bit expensive to take this everyday, however, we see it as an investment , we have only one body and we must care for it as much as we can, we must educate ourselves in what is good and what is bad for our health and question everything, therefore we super recommend this krill oil pills ! Cheers to health!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Sports Research Krill oil
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking fish oil pills for several years for various reasons. I read an article a while back suggesting that Krill oil was a better choice, so I thought I'd give it a try. I buy my supplements from Amazon and looking at the different brands this one looked to be the best. I've been using it for several weeks and it seems to work well with no side effects.
customer_reviews.author: David Santee

customer_reviews.title: I have been in better mood since I am taking SR antartic Krill oil ...
customer_reviews.text: It has been a healthy choice. I have been in better mood since I am taking SR antartic Krill oil dayly. Also it has reduced the joints’ pain considerably. SR antartic krill oil softgels are easier to swallow and present no after taste, and, very important, they do not spoil my stomach. I take one softgel every morning, and it is doing wonderfuls in me.
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: I am currently on my second bottle of Sports Research ...
customer_reviews.text: I am currently on my second bottle of Sports Research Krill Oil, and I must say it is a miracle! I have suffered from bursitis on my shoulder for 9 months and have gone through injections, MRIs, and therapy. The pain persisted until I started on this Krill Oil. I also tried Glucosamine with no luck. I am now back to working out and am pain free. If you suffer from joint pain this is worth a try!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli M. Urbas

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few main brand fish oil and krill oil and one thing in common, they give me burps, and that is not pleasant. With this brand, SR not only the burps have disappeared but my good cholesterol has increased and the bad is going down, that, of course, is with a mix of exercise and using the krill oil once a day in the morning. I use a combination of three (3) SR products and all have good results.
customer_reviews.author: qiuquepr69

customer_reviews.title: Great Krill Oil Supplement at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been impressed with efficacy of Sports Research supplements. Everything from their elegant packaging down to the high quality ingredients in their supplements is top-notch! While looking for a krill oil supplement to take instead of regular fish oil, I found that Sports Research has one. I could not be happier with the quality of this product and plan on taking it daily for years to come. No fishy aftertaste at all I really like that it has some Astaxanthin in addition to the high levels of Omega 3s. Honestly, when I learn about a type of supplement that may provide me with health benefits, the first thing I do is see if SR makes it.
customer_reviews.author: EarthRoamer

customer_reviews.title: Best Krill Oil EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since October 2018 and it is AMAZING! Before I took these, I had a lot of inflammation around my joints, especially my elbows and knees due to too many years of heavy lifting. I take one of these every day and there is a very noticeable difference. If I forget to take it, I notice within about 2 or 3 days, as my joints will start hurting again. These really help to keep the joints well-lubricated and control inflammation. I think it also helps with my muscle recovery. I do not experience any bloating or upset stomach from this brand as opposed to others.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Hair and Skin! Improved Energy!
customer_reviews.text: I would never keep buying SR Krill Oil if it was not a great product. I took one 1000mg daily and was surprised to notice improved energy, something I never noticed when taking another brand. My hair and skin is healthier, also. When I combined it with Cholestoff my cholesterol went down after about 2 months. I don't know if the Krill Oil lowered my cholesterol on its on, because my labwork was not done at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Judy W.

customer_reviews.title: Got my blood work in check
customer_reviews.text: Was tested with high triglycerides and high cholesterol so I decided to give this a shot. Six months later my triglycerides are normal and cholesterol is acceptable. I plan on continuing with these as part of a healthy life routine. Great stuff and no fishy taste or smell!
customer_reviews.author: flo

customer_reviews.title: Best Krill Oil !!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Krill Oil I have ever used,& I have tried many... I had my blood work done & my Dr. called & said it was the best I She said whatever I am doing. continue. It has to be this product. I just ordered another bottle. I highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Leaking pills and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: 2nd bottle in last few months that all the pills were leaking! I’ve used them for years but will be looking for another source. I emailed Sports Research and they put me through the ringer! Everything I offered them was met by asking for pictures, my lot number, order number ect. It never ended. They obviously don’t care about their customers and seemed to blame me for not storing them properly. I’ve heard they were bought out by a Chinese company and is so that makes sense and I’m done with them. Anyone have recommendations for another American company that offers good products?
customer_reviews.author: Jnissly5

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: After testing low in my omega levels, I wanted to add a high quality product that was also low in heavy metals and environmentally friendly. Krill oil is a better alternative to salmon and cod, at least for now, and these have been an easy choice for me to make. I don’t get any after taste or smells from this product and have taken it with food and in between meals without issues at all. I am doing an Amazon monthly subscription for this so I don’t have to be without. I’m excited to see where my numbers will be when I test again next month!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Dias

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: After using various brands of fish oil for many years I never noticed an improvement in my health so I began researching alternative omega 3 products (Krill oil). After reading many customer reviews I narrowed my search down to this product. This supplement is much more effective than traditional omega 3 products and the benefits are noticeable after only a few weeks! My joints became less painful, I recovered faster after workouts and my acne subsided dramatically. Sports Research is a wonderful brand that has gained my trust as a long term customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Omega-3 Supplement I've Taken
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of Krill Oil and it is ten times better than the old Omega 3 supplement I used to take. You can actually tell that this is doing something. I can't see myself taking another Omega 3 supplement other than this any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Krill Oil!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been taking your krill oil pills for a while now. It has helped us with inflammation. As well as other health benefits such as heart and brain health. We love that we do not burp up any fish taste. Which we are really grateful for. Thank you for that. Keep up the great work. Since we loved this krill oil, we decided to buy the cherries which I would be happy to review about. Very pleased with the cherries as well. We started trying the blueberries too for a couple of days now too. I would definitely recommend all the products we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ken's Babydoll

customer_reviews.title: Very goo
customer_reviews.text: So far I really really like this product, it did cause a little stomach upset the first couple times I took it but that has since gone away. I have noticed a improvement in my dry skin, and over all muscle soreness that comes with being active and over 50. One review wisely recommended keeping them in the fridge to cut down on the odor which helps greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few products from sports research. All seem to be ok except this one. The gel tabs that came were rock hard. Like literal stones. No bend in them at all. Must be an old batch I got. Wasn’t happy so I returned and now waiting for new. Felt like hard plastic. Kind of sketchy. The company seems legit but everything online on YouTube from them is in Asia. All the voice overs on videos are robots talking lol. Who knows if we are getting krill or set up to be killed. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: David Simon

customer_reviews.title: Smaller pills,  easier to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for help with the eyes.. fighting dry eyes.. there is no fishy smell.. on occasion I do get fish burps, but not often. but I do notice a difference with fighting dry eyes.. if I miss a couple of days of taking these I start having dry eye issues.. I'd recommend them.. they are suppose to be helpful for the joints also..
customer_reviews.author: Ghost rider

customer_reviews.title: Sports Research Krill Oil
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was worried I would have that fish smell and taste along with burping, with Sports Research Krill Oil there was none! I have no swelling in my arthritic fingers in the morning or the inability to make a fist. I get all the benefits of DHA, Omega 3's, without having to consume fish/seafood; which I am not fond of. My blood pressure is down, my skin is only slightly dry instead of scaly looking like before. The wrinkles on my face don't seem so prominent; or my eyes are getting worse :) I will continue taking Sports Research Krill Oil every day as directed on the label.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Antonio Valverde

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the long term health benefits. I assume it works for that, but I am not a chemist nor have I evaluated the impact of taking this vs not in the longer term. That said, I like that there is a third party consortium that verifies this is a quality product, and this both easy to swallow and doesn't give me fish breath/burps. I'm taking this because krill oil is supposed to be better than regular fish oil for EPA+DHA, and because it's lower on the food chain. I suppose astaxanthin is also good but I'm taking this more for EPA+DHA.
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Oil coated pills
customer_reviews.text: I found no damaged capsules, but all the tablets were coated in red oil. Container was sealed and shipping package undamaged. I can only assume very poor factory handling/quality control.
customer_reviews.author: PWDerry

customer_reviews.title: This is organic and has the Astaxanthin which will help it to work better in our bodies
customer_reviews.text: As someone over 50 I believe there is enough scientific evidence that we need to supplement our diet for certain vitamins and minerals. This is organic and has the Astaxanthin which will help it to work better in our bodies. And as much pollution that there is in the world the Antarctic Krill Oil is possible the least effects of pollution. Do your research and take the best possible product that is available. I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Heart patient recommended
customer_reviews.text: After recently having my cardiologist recommend fish oil, I decided to try some SR Antarctic krill oil. It tastes of no fish, and I have an appointment in approx 1 month to check my lipids. I am hoping, and expect to find improvement. Just recently ordered my second bottle. There are no downsides to taking this supplement, to my experience. The fish oil I used to take had a smell and a fishy taste. This has neither. Yes, I will be purchasing yet another bottle when the time comes. I recommend it. BTW...I am a LPN, if that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: GhreyGhost

customer_reviews.title: no fish burp!
customer_reviews.text: I do not eat any kind of seafood so I am forced to take fish oil. I dreaded taking it each morning. then i found Sports Research Krill oil! Krill oil is absorbed better by the body and has more nutrients than Fish oil, including but not limited to phospholipids, choline, and astaxanthin. The best part?! Sports Research Krill Oil doesn't give you those NASTY "Fish Burps!" (note: because Krill are in the same family as shrimp, people who have shellfish allergies should avoid taking krill oil supplements.)
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Castle

customer_reviews.title: Renewed brain cognitive function
customer_reviews.text: I researched and found that Krill with Astaxanthin was more beneficial than Just taking Omegas and that Astaxanthin was a very powerful antioxidant. I am 67 years young and due to recent stress, found my cognitive brain functions suffering. This supplement, after taking for a couple weeks has improved my brain functions immensely! Plus my good immune system feels restored. Thank You for your diligence and research to arrive at this product!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Charles F.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fish oil
customer_reviews.text: On this for two weeks now, I've had some luck with fish oil in the past so I did my research and think Krill is probably best source for omegas. I haven had any of the taste, burping side effects and like the certified ingredients. Also ran a check and their views are legit. I'm taking for inflammation as I have 4 herniated discs and still golf and play softball. I will buy this product again. So I'm on my second bottle. It seems to really help. I'm mixing it with Tumric and I have pretty much eleminated pain meds from my life. Not as effective as prescription medication but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at good price
customer_reviews.text: I take krill oil to help me with mental clarity and also for joint comfort and to hopefully help with my high cholesterol. I believe it does help significantly with the first two - when I stop taking it it seems to get worse, and when I get back on the routine it is better. I cannot speak to the level of benefit for the cholesterol, have not bee to get it measured for two years. The product is nice and fresh - I do not suffer from fishy aftertaste as long as I take it with food or at bedtime. Good value, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps fight Bad Cholesterol
customer_reviews.text: At the advise of our heart doctor, we no longer should take COQ10. When we stop taking it we looked around for similar heart healthy product. We have been taking your Krill oil for over a year now and although we cannot pinpoint any specific physical changes that we experience from using it, our 90 day blood work results are much better than when we took the COQ10 by itself. The biggest improvement can be seen in the bad cholesterol levels. All 3 of my husband's doctors have expressed how pleased they are with levels being well under 100 after years of struggling to get it down with various meds. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anorexia Joint Relief
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with an eating disorder that tends to worsen with stress, for many years now. Due to the recent pandemic, the stress has caused me to lose alot of weight. Since I've lost weight, my joints were in alot of pain. I wanted a good quality product that might help this while I regain weight. Sports Research's Krill Oil helped from DAY 1! I went from not being able to stand on a tile floor for more than 5 min, to being able to run around in the yard with my dog again! I plan on taking this daily for a very long time. ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Softgels Leak Orange Oil -- on Everything
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these Softgels weep or leak. I put my prescriptions in small containers -- about two-week's worth at a time. The Krill gel capsule "weeped" and dissolved the other meds. Perhaps, it was only this one container, but if this problem is to be expected, it would have been nice to know before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B.

customer_reviews.title: SPORTS RESEARCH IS THE BEST KRILL OIL I HAVE EVER TRIED HANDS DOWN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sports Research krill oil is soooo much better than fish oil. The two are not even comparable. This blows fish oil away! It's also better than any other krill oil I have tried in the past. The gels are tiny and easy to swallow, but they're powerful! There is zero after taste. I noticed a difference after only 3 weeks taking these. I felt more energy and definitely less aches and pains. I will continue to take these as long as Sports research continues to make them. I highly recommend these (and often do)!
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: No fishy aftertaste and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time reviewing fish oils and articles discussing the benefits, stuck this in my wish list, and forgot about it. I spend a lot of time reviewing everything I purchase lol! Recently, a doctor recommended I add fish oil to my diet. I checked, and the reviews for this had nearly doubled, so I finally ordered it. After just a few days of taking the Antarctic Krill Oil, I've noticed that I'm sleeping better. It's too soon to tell if this is specifically due to that, but I'm hopeful. But the fact that I don't get any fishy aftertaste is encouraging. This means I'll keep taking it and can provide a more meaningful review later.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Krill Oil as a supplement. The SR brand product is a good value and seems to be of excellent quality. I especially like that only one pill is necessary for daily dosage. This is a money savings. But, it also means one less pill to take. I take a number of dietary supplements. So, the less pills that are required the better. I can detect no smell or after taste like some products. I will definitely order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: trusted product
customer_reviews.text: I am 62 years old. I began to take Sports Research Krill oil omega 3 1000 mg everyday because I have high LDL cholesterol level and I also forgetting things from time to time. I hope and believe that this Krill oil lower my LDL cholesterol level and improve my memory recall.
customer_reviews.author: Yoon

customer_reviews.title: No after taste or smell
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No fishy taste or after taste at all. Very easy to swallow, smaller pill than I initially thought. When I first reviewed the packaging for purchase I had the impression that the various strengths of elements were at a higher quantity and being a one pill a day had many positives. But I see that the strengths are on the low end compared to two pill a day products. I’m taking one a day for now. I just started so nothing further to report.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget S

customer_reviews.title: Everything I read about "Krill" says it helps.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking "Krill Oil" 1000mg tabs, one each day for over a year, now. I am unsure if they are doing anything for my rhumatoid arthritis but everything I read about "Krill" says it helps mobility, so I continur to take it. I give my dog one tablet daily, also and it seems to help the stiffness in his hind quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: Skip The Fish And Get The Krill
customer_reviews.text: I find SR Krill Oil to be one of the most competitively priced and effective krill products on the market. I’ve been using this product for nearly a year and have never regretted it. Krill are shorter lived (less worries about heavy metals and pollution sea), are more sustainable, and have better quantities of Omega 3, DHA &EPA, and also naturally includes Astaxanthin (good for you and naturally preserves Omegas and other lipids).
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Decent krill capsule
customer_reviews.text: I like them. I take these to help cholesterol levels and heart health. It does have a very slight fishy taste for a few minutes about 30 minutes after taking capsule but nothing crazy.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: FISH BURPS & HEARTBURN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Day one, produced a small amount of fish burps. I thought strange because krill oil has never done that to me before. Day two, pill got stuck halfway down & almost instantly started having fish burbs. Then came the horrid heartburn. Twenty minutes later I was feeling lightheaded and nausea. There will be no day three. Bottle, meet trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: My triglycerides dropped
customer_reviews.text: I used these with a popular psyllium fiber supplement and my triglycerides dropped in half. Of course, I changed my diet too, but these are great. It isn't always easy or practical to eat oily fish and these are a good substitute. I have not experienced a fishy taste or "burps" and they don't upset my stomach. I was pleasantly surprised with my lab results. I would recommend also using a popular mixable psyllium fiber supplement with them. It worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be protecting my skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I work in the sun daily and I heard that it protects skin from sun damage. I must say that I have not burned once since using this product working in the Las Vegas sun. I am very pleased and am currently on my second bottle. I love Sports Research products thus far and have yet to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kendall roberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Antarctic Krill Oil from Sports Research was my first choice - after reading the reviews and confirmation that they're Certified by the Marine Stewardship Council (MSC) as well as an IKOS Certified 5 star krill oil - I knew this was the product I was looking for. With no aftertaste and easy to swallow small capsules, these have everything I'm looking for in a quality Omega 3 supplement. I've found my new Omega 3 staple.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: I have been taking krill for over a year as a beneficiary supplement to reduce bad cholesterol and high blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: What drew me to try the product was the amount of information that was provided before purchasing. There are a lot of inferior products out there masquerading as pure krill, there is no doubt this is pure and highest quality. I have been taking krill for over a year as a beneficiary supplement to reduce bad cholesterol and high blood pressure. This product is right on the mark and I feel great! Thanks for delivering a quality product that instills confidence.
customer_reviews.author: J. Luther

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: I take only 1 per day because I am also taking other omega supplement. I feel that without this, some of my aches come back. So definitely this is doing something to alleviate some of my muscle, tendon and body aches. Careful too when taking omega as it sometimes changes your hormonal balance. The key is consistency. If you feel better, then do not stop abruptly taking it. The gels are smaller than fish oils. Smells like dried shrimps but no burp smell and it is how it is. I receive them where the soft gels are not all stuck together when I shake them. Hopefully, the quality stays that way.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: Okay but crap quality, leaking pills
customer_reviews.text: There is a leak in a pill or something because every time I get a pill out my hands get all red and slimey. Seriously? This company can't create a clean product for $25? Haven't noticed a huge difference since I started taking the pills about a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMan

customer_reviews.title: Great for my German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this SR Krill Oil for my German Shepherd. She was experiencing allergies with a lot of scratching. The vet wanted to do shots but I wanted to try a natural approach. Krill Oil is great for dogs and within a month, the scratching stopped and her fur is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: ScarlettZ

customer_reviews.title: top quality product continues to stabilize both hdl/ldl readings and elasticity of my arteries
customer_reviews.text: Quality and Astaxanthin quantity with double strength make this the best combination of ingredients and plays an important roll in my heart and joint health. I continue to believe this quality is superior and more effective with the Astaxanthin added.
customer_reviews.author: elliott

customer_reviews.title: i've been taking 1 a day for the past few months
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking 1 a day for the past few months. I can't say I can pin point the effect of this product alone. I am a very healthy person with a very healthy diet in general and I feel great. And I am sure this products plays a part of that but I can't say with certainty how big of a part. I think everything I do contributes to me feeling great and this product is just a small part of that regimen
customer_reviews.author: Tuna

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - Just not for me?
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking fish oil for quite some time and started reading about how your body may be able to absorb Krill oil better so I decided to give it a shot. I’ve been taking these for a little over a month now and have to say I felt better when taking fish oil (same brand). I don’t suffer from blood pressure problems, but it has been a bit higher then my normal when taking fish oil. Also I felt like fish oil helped with my mood and ADHD more. Not a bad product, just might not be what my body prefers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All good here
customer_reviews.text: Second bottle already, will keep on ordering. I appreciate that it is made with Superba2 (Aker Biomarine) Krill Oil and hope to see results soon. I also appreciate MSC and IKOS certification. All in all, one of the best products on the market in this category, with a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: The gelcaps are delicate.
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat disappointed in that the individual gelcaps are VERY delicate. I have had the caps rupture several times in the weekly pill receptacle in which I place 7 each week. The amount leaked varies from just a little to the entire content of the cap. I always try to use them if not too much leaks out, but I have to tell you the taste is vile and the remnants is a pain to clean out of the pill receptacle.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Poor QC
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the recent quality (last few months), finding empty tabs (leaking) and a reserve of rank krill oil at the bottom of the container. Back to VitaCost.
customer_reviews.author: kpspero

customer_reviews.title: SportsResearch makes a high quality E source
customer_reviews.text: Krill oil is considered the best source of Vitamin E from "fish" sources, and SR makes a great product that is easy to swallow, is easily absorbed, has no fishy taste or smell if properly stored, is delivered quickly and it is priced right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Encino Tg

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have had joint pain mostly in my knees for years and after doing some research, I came across some information on Krill Oil, It is said to relieve joint pain along with other benefits. I started reading reviews on which brand was the the purest and the best quality and Sports Research got very high marks. I am on my 2nd bottle and I can not believe the change in my joints, specifically my knees. I plan on continuing to use this product and researching their other products as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Burton

customer_reviews.title: Caused migraines
customer_reviews.text: I took this product 3 nights in a row and every morning woke up with a migraine that would not go away. Once I stopped taking them, migraine was gone. I am returning this,
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Good expectations
customer_reviews.text: Since I started taking these Krill pills I feel I'm sleeping better in the night and have less somnolence in the afternoon. I've also noticed my nails are brighter and that's a good sign. I started using krill pills expecting to improve my blood lipids but that's something not really noticeable until we test our blood in the lab. I'm taking 1 pill a day.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: No more dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Krill oil for dry eyes. Within a couple weeks my eyes stopped weeping and feel so much better. I’m also taking krill for arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Solid value on the latest in Omega 3’s
customer_reviews.text: I am a big believer in omega 3’s and have been taking them for years. First via fish oil, then through concentrated DHA fish oils, and now the research is showing Krill Oil is the way to go. With better absorption due to it's phospholipid binding and the asthaxanthin antioxidant kicker it truly is the way to go. Don’t be confused by the DHA levels appearing lower in Krill Oil your absorption rate makes up for the difference. Great product at an always great value.
customer_reviews.author: The Sites Unofficial Pharmacist

customer_reviews.title: Great product as always from SR sports
customer_reviews.text: I always liked to take krill oil over fish oil and SR Sports have a just that as a great price and in easy to swallow softgel. 1 softgel contain 115mg of omega 3s and I take 1-2 each 3/days (with meal). It has worked greatly for my joints before and expecting nothing less now. No taste since this is just a softgel - no after taste or fish burp, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SatSeh

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This Krill oil is the best and i have tried other brands before .My joint pain goes away within a week of daily use .My vision is much better and my Eye Doctor was impressed with the results .Nothing bad to report everything was great .Will continue to purchase .Highly recommend this Krill oil to family and friends ..Great product . Abdul
customer_reviews.author: Abdul

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Began using these instead of my daily regimen of taking 2-3 fish oil pills. I take these in addition to my K2 + Vitamin D3 and Turmeric. I like that I can only take one pill and I feel great. Love that sports research lives up to their name and actually researches their products to make sure that they're packed with quality, environmentally responsible products. Their price tag is not too shabby either. I will continue to use these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kurainova

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST Krill Oil I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT Krill Oil. I attribute this product to having a significant impact on lowering my triglyceroids. I have had many Krill Oils in the past and this Krill Oil by Sports Research is superior to other brands I've tried based on years of sampling. I am on my 4th bottle now and I am not switching any longer. My doctor had told me that my Trys had significantly reduced from a high of 700 to within normal limits. I'm obviously made some dietary and exercise changes as well but I really believe in this product. I am now trying their CLA as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew On a Journey

customer_reviews.title: A great brand for krill oil
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking the Sports Research krill oil for a couple years now and am very pleased with the quality and price. Unlike some other brands I used to buy the SR capsules are always fresh, not leaking in the bottle, no rancid smells, and they sit well on my stomach. Krill oil has a host of benefits to overall health and is an important part of my supplementation.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Martin Photography

customer_reviews.title: GREATLY helps sore joints (plus)+!!
customer_reviews.text: Mid age man with real bad knees until I started taking one of these with 1 of the "WILD FISH OIL" in (big white letters on dark bottle) per day. Knee pain REALLY went almost immediately away. I began taking the WILD FISH OIL alon WITH this, bec. I heard that DPA was very important. It obviously IS. This combo WORKS GREAT. Very few fish oils have DPA, this one does. No bad flavor or smell at all. Seems to also help colon/intestinal/bowel functioning. No other side effects noticed.
customer_reviews.author: CK7

customer_reviews.title: It's been a needed help.
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking quite a few products from this company. I'm taking Krill, along with Astaxanthin, and Lutein.I'm mostly taking for sore joints and pain. I have trouble going up and downstairs. Also getting up from sitting after a short length of time. I have pain in my knees when I take the stairs. I have been on everything for about a week. I really didn't expect results this soon, but I have already noticed a big difference. It's been a needed help.
customer_reviews.author: LKB2004

customer_reviews.title: much better than fish oil
customer_reviews.text: I love the SR antartic Krill Oil. This is my second bottle I've ordered and I'l take this over fish oil anyday. I've always hated taking fish oil because of the nasty fish oil burp. You know what I'm talking about if you ever took fish oil. This is much more potent but no more fishy taste that comes up when you burp. If you take fish oil, toss it and get the SR antartic Krill Oil, you will never look back. I know I won't.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Antarctic Krill Oil (500mg) with Omega-3s EPA, DHA and Astaxanthin (120 Mini-Softgels) purchased from Amazon over a month ago. Product arrived fresh and pills were not stuck together or melted. Product is easy to swallow and does not give me any fish burps. I have not noticed any difference in how I feel but don't believe I will.
customer_reviews.author: T. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Strong & healthy Nail & Hair Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my first bottle of Krill Oil and especially was impressed that there is no fishy aftertaste or smell as there are with other fish oil supplements. I am taking this to help with strengthening nails and hair. Too early to tell if it is helping me but this product was recommended by a friend who has had wonderful results since taking these pills for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Boncher

customer_reviews.title: Brain Food
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for your heart and brain. I'm able to remember larger numbers easier and it helped me learn photoshop easier so it seems? Good stuff and better than fish oil because of its structure, all though less epa and dha than fish oil krill oil is accepted by the bodily easier.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: My go-to supplement for omega 3
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the Sports Research Antarctic Krill Oil for several years, primarily to boost my Omega 3 levels. I am a post-menopausal women with an immune deficiency disorder, and I know this supplement is an important part of my health protocol. I have used krill oil from other suppliers, but the Science Research product is the only supplement that never gives me "fishy burps" after taking. Also, this brand is the only one that has never had a leaking capsule in the bottle. This has been a healthy addition to a clean way of eating that has cooled down the systemic inflammation I hosted in my body for a long time during my earlier years.
customer_reviews.author: Rockyray

customer_reviews.title: Contains the Omega-3s and astaxanthin I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love that this Krill Oil is small, sustainably-harvested, and contains the Omega-3s that I need. I'm taking this over regular fish oil Omega-3s because it contains astaxanthin. With my family history of terrible eye sight and just about every eye condition/disease under the sun, I need the astaxanthin. This product also helps with overall inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at combating and preventing inflamed joints and tendons!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I stopped taking Omega-3 supplements a while back, I developed a nagging pain in my triceps tendon, probably due to some kind of inflammation/minor tendinitis from training and work. In order to help with the inflammation in my joints and tendons, I decided to give krill oil a try, being highly recommended by my friends. I have been taking it with breakfast every day for a little longer than a couple of weeks now, and it has helped me tremendously in my post-workout recovery and with the inflammation in my joints and tendons. Great product! Loving it so far! :)
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Krill Oil has benefits
customer_reviews.text: I began taking this supplement on the advice of my Chiropractor who teaches at Palmer Chiropractic College where I live . I have hip and spine issues and prefer using natural methods to decrease discomfort. By adding this to my daily regime I have slowly seen improvement in my comfort level and range of motion particularly in my neck. I will continue to take it to see if the improvement continues and increases.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Q

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Krill Oil from many sources and never have I had one that has the odor that this one has. It smells just like fish oil and that is why I don't like Fish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: No Fishy Smell
customer_reviews.text: My number one favorite thing about this Krill Oil is that it does not smell "fishy." I am not a fish-eater, but after learning the many great benefits over regular old fish oil, I was sold. I take one capsule twice daily and I never burp, taste or breathe fish. I have the usual arthritis of a 73 year old female in all my joints, but without the usual pain and stiffness. Even when getting up in the morning, I have NONE, I think of taking my Krill Oil as getting my "lube job!"
customer_reviews.author: S. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality krill oil
customer_reviews.text: This Antarctic krill oil has excellent dark packaging to minimize the light coming into the bottle. The EPA and DHA in these capsules seems to have improved my cognitive ability and seems to have helped increase my HDH cholesterol numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

product_meta.title: Antarctic Krill Oil (Double Strength) with Omega-3s EPA, DHA and Astaxanthin (60 Softgels - 1000mg)
feature_bullets: ✔ More Krill for your dollar: Contains 1000 mg of Krill oil per SOFTGEL with more naturally occurring EPA, DHA, Phospholipids and Astaxanthin than any other Krill brand.
✔ NEW Advance Formula: Made with Superba2 Krill Oil, a new advance formula clinically proven to increase omega-3 fatty acid levels in the body*.

✔ Less Krill smell with No Aftertaste: The new Superba2 has substantially reduced the Krill smell. The phospholipid-bound omega-3 fatty acids are water dispersible, making them easier to digest than fish oil. Goodbye gross, fishy aftertaste!

✔ Sustainably Sourced: Superba Krill is sustainably harvested and 100% traceable from sea to shelf. Certified by the Marine Stewardship Council (MSC) and IKOS 5 star certified Krill Oil (See IKOS independent testing in the image section).
✔ Money Back Guarantee: If you’re not thrilled with our product, let us know within 90 days and receive a prompt and courteous refund. We stand behind our formula!^
